name: tests
description:
This is a task manager app made as part of the Generation USA Jr Web Developer Bootcamp. It was built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

Here is a live demo: https://jackbayly.github.io/group-4-project/

Collaborators include Carlos Martinez (CarlosM35), Dunamis Anthony (Dunamis234), Iyadunni Idowu (coding83cutie), Jack O'Hara (JackBayly), Jocelyn Fields (Jocelyn Fields), and Paris Lucas (lbparis).
